item.description:
Please bring some pictures, a favorite book, or a magazine to discuss and inspire conversation!

Park on the street or in a lot on Third Street, across from the Strand theater and Ross Furniture. I'll sit at a table near the door until 7:10-7:15 (or until 3-4 people arrive and we move to a larger table). Look for the red and white Meetup sign on the table!

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Seacoast NH French Language December Meetup
